page.description: Returns all errors that occurred when synchronizing a List.
page.discussion: Only applies to Lists that have a Detail View. Returns an array of objects containing all errors that occurred when synchronizing the List. One object is created for each error. Each error object in the array has the following properties:

item.name: errorType
item.description: The type of error. Can be 'writeConflict', 'serverSide', or 'globalError'.

item.name: path
item.description: The 'path' to get to the row that had the error. If the error was in a child List, the path wil indicate how to navigate to the child row.
